pages.text: Jetpack Units will allow your MekaSuit Bodyarmor to have the functions of a $(l:item/equipment/jetpack)Jetpack$(/l). Once applied, the MekaSuit Bodyarmor will have an internal storage for hydrogen (48,000mb).

The Jetpack Unit is best paired with the $(l:item/modules/module_electrolytic_breathing_unit)Electrolytic Breathing Unit$(/l). Doing so allows the accumulation of hydrogen when underwater or in the rain. $(p)Alternatively, hydrogen can manually be refueled using a $(l:storage/gas)Chemical Tank$(/l) or anything else that can output Hydrogen.$(p)Max units per bodyarmor: 1
